includedAssets.title: For Those Who Think Young
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep1 - For Those Who Think Young
includedAssets.synopsis: As season two begins, Don and Duck butt heads over an account while the office is abuzz over the arrival of a snazzy new piece of equipment.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As season two begins, Don and Duck butt heads over an account while the office is abuzz over the arrival of a snazzy new piece of equipment.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As season two begins, Don and Duck butt heads over an account while the office is abuzz over the arrival of a snazzy new piece of equipment.

includedAssets.title: Flight 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Despite a conflict of interest, Duck uses an unorthodox approach to land an airline account, while Paul surprises his colleagues with a special guest.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Despite a conflict of interest, Duck uses an unorthodox approach to land an airline account, while Paul surprises his colleagues with a special guest.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Despite a conflict of interest, Duck uses an unorthodox approach to land an airline account, while Paul surprises his colleagues with a special guest.

includedAssets.title: The Benefactor
includedAssets.synopsis: Problems arise during a commercial shoot while Don is AWOL from the office. Betty steps in to help at a dinner to placate Don's disgruntled clients.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Problems arise during a commercial shoot while Don is AWOL from the office. Betty steps in to help at a dinner to placate Don's disgruntled clients.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Problems arise during a commercial shoot while Don is AWOL from the office. Betty steps in to help at a dinner to placate Don's disgruntled clients.

includedAssets.title: Three Sundays
includedAssets.synopsis: While Peggy's family entertains the new parish priest, it's all hands on deck at the agency as the staff prepare for a high-pressured pitch.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Peggy's family entertains the new parish priest, it's all hands on deck at the agency as the staff prepare for a high-pressured pitch.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Peggy's family entertains the new parish priest, it's all hands on deck at the agency as the staff prepare for a high-pressured pitch.

includedAssets.title: The New Girl
includedAssets.synopsis: Peggy comes to the rescue when Don must deal with issues between a TV comedian and his wife. Elsewhere, Joan may have found Don the perfect secretary.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Peggy comes to the rescue when Don must deal with issues between a TV comedian and his wife. Elsewhere, Joan may have found Don the perfect secretary.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Peggy comes to the rescue when Don must deal with issues between a TV comedian and his wife. Elsewhere, Joan may have found Don the perfect secretary.

includedAssets.title: Maidenform
includedAssets.synopsis: While Don and Duck attempt to make peace, Peggy tries to get herself into the execs' after-hours meetings.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Don and Duck attempt to make peace, Peggy tries to get herself into the execs' after-hours meetings.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Don and Duck attempt to make peace, Peggy tries to get herself into the execs' after-hours meetings.

includedAssets.title: The Gold Violin
includedAssets.synopsis: Don's secretary makes an error that could spell trouble for Joan. Meanwhile, Pete, Harry and Ken must put their heads together to land new accounts.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Don's secretary makes an error that could spell trouble for Joan. Meanwhile, Pete, Harry and Ken must put their heads together to land new accounts.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Don's secretary makes an error that could spell trouble for Joan. Meanwhile, Pete, Harry and Ken must put their heads together to land new accounts.

includedAssets.title: A Night To Remember
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep8 - A Night To Remember
includedAssets.synopsis: Don and Dick team up to woo a foreign-beer client, while Harry turns to an unlikely source for help when his department is overloaded with work.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Don and Dick team up to woo a foreign-beer client, while Harry turns to an unlikely source for help when his department is overloaded with work.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Don and Dick team up to woo a foreign-beer client, while Harry turns to an unlikely source for help when his department is overloaded with work.

includedAssets.title: Six Month Leave
includedAssets.synopsis: While Freddy disappoints his team during a pitch, Pete finds an opportunity he can exploit. Elsewhere, Don proves his loyalty to an old friend.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Freddy disappoints his team during a pitch, Pete finds an opportunity he can exploit. Elsewhere, Don proves his loyalty to an old friend.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Freddy disappoints his team during a pitch, Pete finds an opportunity he can exploit. Elsewhere, Don proves his loyalty to an old friend.

includedAssets.title: The Inheritance
includedAssets.synopsis: While Betty visits her father, Pete's mother disapproves of Pete and Trudy's plans. Sheila tries to convince Paul to prioritise his civic duties.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Betty visits her father, Pete's mother disapproves of Pete and Trudy's plans. Sheila tries to convince Paul to prioritise his civic duties.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Betty visits her father, Pete's mother disapproves of Pete and Trudy's plans. Sheila tries to convince Paul to prioritise his civic duties.

includedAssets.title: The Jet Set
includedAssets.synopsis: During a business trip to Los Angeles, Don encounters some interesting new acquaintances. In New York, Duck contemplates his future at the agency.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: During a business trip to Los Angeles, Don encounters some interesting new acquaintances. In New York, Duck contemplates his future at the agency.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: During a business trip to Los Angeles, Don encounters some interesting new acquaintances. In New York, Duck contemplates his future at the agency.

includedAssets.title: The Mountain King
includedAssets.synopsis: An account hangs in the balance when Pete's personal life gets problematic. Don reconnects with an old friend and Joan introduces her boyfriend.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: An account hangs in the balance when Pete's personal life gets problematic. Don reconnects with an old friend and Joan introduces her boyfriend.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: An account hangs in the balance when Pete's personal life gets problematic. Don reconnects with an old friend and Joan introduces her boyfriend.

includedAssets.title: Meditations In An Emergency
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep13 - Meditations In An Emergency
includedAssets.synopsis: Sterling Cooper's future begins to look uncertain while Don is away from the office. Betty receives some upsetting news. Last in series.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sterling Cooper's future begins to look uncertain while Don is away from the office. Betty receives some upsetting news. Last in series.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sterling Cooper's future begins to look uncertain while Don is away from the office. Betty receives some upsetting news. Last in series.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: As Peggy rises through the ranks at Sterling Cooper, Don battles to keep his head above the water at home and at work. Critically-acclaimed second season starring Jon Hamm and Elisabeth Moss.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Peggy climbs the ladder at Sterling Cooper, Don battles to keep his head above the water at home and at work. Critically-acclaimed second season.

includedIn.title: Mad Men
includedIn.synopsis: The ambitious Peggy Olson joins the stylish world of 1960s New York advertising as the new secretary of mysterious executive Don Draper at prestigious ad agency Sterling Cooper.
